channel.title: NEED Help client error - unexplained.. need help!
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2vttq3t.png[/img]
thats what pops up when i try to build the client... the build or compile thing. also when i run a 508+ client i put in my local ip address 127.0.0.1 because i have my 508 up. and it stops dead cold at sound engine preparing or loaded item list. I have no idea why it does this, can anyone be of assistance??
